verses.name: Job 42:1
verses.text: Then Job answered the Lord, and said,

verses.name: Job 42:2
verses.text: I know that thou canst do every thing, and that no thought can be withholden from thee.

verses.name: Job 42:3
verses.text: Who is he that hideth counsel without knowledge? therefore have I uttered that I understood not; things too wonderful for me, which I knew not.

verses.name: Job 42:4
verses.text: Hear, I beseech thee, and I will speak: I will demand of thee, and declare thou unto me.

verses.name: Job 42:5
verses.text: I have heard of thee by the hearing of the ear: but now mine eye seeth thee.

verses.name: Job 42:6
verses.text: Wherefore I abhor myself, and repent in dust and ashes.
